item.description:
@i_ancients_i wrote:

[quote=“P3rscape, post:11, topic:117709”][quote author=i ancients i link=topic=166992.msg1553510#msg1553510 date=1183072547]

[quote author=P3rscape link=topic=166992.msg1553498#msg1553498 date=1183072409]

um… Why do you want us to pm you?
Why not here, it doesnt make sense unless
you got something up your sleeve.
Dont try nothing to anyone!
[/quote] lol…ok post the apps here then…can you help me with any of my questions?

Hehe okay, much better =]] Yea i can actually help you with your forums. I own a site and help
ThatOneServer on one (Rs2Codes.com Best site everz.) lol so yea.

Java experience:7/10
Helpful with servers?: Depends what you mean
Helpful with forums?: yea. 
Good coder?:yup yup.
How long will you play on my server a day, when it comes out?:Not as much as i should, i got a job you know.
Will you abuse powers or flame,spam people?: HAHA who would? lol

[/quote] Some people abuse n shit…accepted…what position do u want?

Ill take any. Any you want.[/quote] umm…k ill change that now, join my forums and like post that u joined or w\e and sfm hacks…still didnt see the rep thing

item.title: Smfforfree help with forums
item.dc:creator: @i_ancients_i i ancients i
item.description:
@i_ancients_i wrote:

[quote=“SMF Hacks, post:5, topic:117709”]Please Do Not Post This Here … Post This http://smfforfree.com/ —> Support Forums ----> General Support

Your Answer : Just Give Reps Like Normaly Like in Moparscape.org/smf … or if you want lots of reps If your a Admin
Go To There Profile ----> Forum Profile Information ----->
You Will See :
Rep + Rep -
(Total: 0)
Just Change it

At The Bottom of the Topic Just Just at the Bottom of Quick Reply You Will see :
Move Topic | Remove Topic | Lock topic | Set topic non-sticky | Merge Topics

And For Mod and Staff Go to
Admin —> Membergroups ----> Global Moderator (etc.) -----> List of Members to Add: ________[/quote] thanks…but i dont see rep+ or - i see like personal text etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Smfforfree help with forums
item.dc:creator: @SMF_Hacks SMF Hacks
item.description:
@SMF_Hacks wrote:

Please Do Not Post This Here … Post This http://smfforfree.com/ —> Support Forums ----> General Support

Your Answer : Just Give Reps Like Normaly Like in Moparscape.org/smf … or if you want lots of reps If your a Admin
Go To There Profile ----> Forum Profile Information ----->
You Will See :
Rep + Rep -
(Total: 0)
Just Change it

At The Bottom of the Topic Just Just at the Bottom of Quick Reply You Will see :
Move Topic | Remove Topic | Lock topic | Set topic non-sticky | Merge Topics

And For Mod and Staff Go to
Admin —> Membergroups ----> Global Moderator (etc.) -----> List of Members to Add: ________

Read full topic
